## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description      | Type     | Default   |
| ------------- | ------------- | ---------------- | -------- | --------- |
| `height`      | `height`      | 输入框高度            | `number` | `160`     |
| `limit`       | `limit`       | 最大长度             | `number` | `120`     |
| `placeholder` | `placeholder` | placeholder 提示信息 | `string` | `'请输入内容'` |
